document_data.title: Murder in Baldur's Gate
document_data.author:
[[Ed Greenwood]]
[[Matt Sernett]]
[[Steve Winter]]
document_data.Contents:
Contents
* 64-page setting book describing Baldur's Gate and its inhabitants
* 32-page adventure book
* Four-panel, foldout DM screen keyed to the adventure
* Illustrated folder
